node.name: Beyond CVS
node.shortdescription:
This Eclipse plug-in enables the use of Beyond Compare (externally) to compare files and folders. You can also compare a file to a previous revision in CVS/SVN or in your Local History. It also allows you to open up Putty and WinSCP from inside Eclipse.

It adds extra actions to the package explorer context menu under the 'Compare With...' menu as well as some toolbar buttons.

There is also a separate Commit action under the 'Team' menu which allows you to revert, refresh, or compare (using Beyond Compare) the files being committed to the latest head revison.

Supports both Subversion plug-ins: Subclipse and Subversive.
node.body:
This Eclipse plug-in enables the use of Beyond Compare (externally) to compare files and folders. You can also compare a file to a previous revision in CVS/SVN or in your Local History. It also allows you to open up Putty and WinSCP from inside Eclipse.

It adds extra actions to the package explorer context menu under the 'Compare With...' menu as well as some toolbar buttons.

There is also a separate Commit action under the 'Team' menu which allows you to revert, refresh, or compare (using Beyond Compare) the files being committed to the latest head revison.

Supports both Subversion plug-ins: Subclipse and Subversive.
